pages.text: By placing at least one or more $(item)Water Bottles$() in the lower three slots of the brewing interface, an ingredient in the upper slot, and $(item)Blaze Powder$() in the fuel slot, a $(thing)Player$() can distill the ingredients into each $(item)Bottle$() and brew $(item)Potions$() that may be consumed to grant an effect to the $(thing)Player$().

pages.title: Base Potions
pages.text: Base potions are $(item)Potions$() without effects, brewed by adding a single base ingredient to a $(item)Water Bottle$(). Of these, only the $(item)Awkward Potion$() can be imbued with an effect ingredient to produce a $(thing)Potion Effect$().

pages.title: Effect Potions
pages.text: $(item)Potions$() are bottled substances which give $(thing)Players$() and mobs a limited-time or instant status effect if drunk or within its splash radius when thrown (in the case of $(item)Lingering$() and $(item)Splash Potions$()).

pages.title: Potion Upgrades
pages.text: Upgrading a $(item)Potion$() involves a trade-off between duration and potency. An enhanced effect has shorter duration, and extended duration cannot have an enhanced effect.
